signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a ticketing software to track onboarding and offboarding processes but finds the current product lacks asset management features.
signals.customer_ask: A system that generates tasks or child tickets for onboarding and offboarding.
signals.suggested_solution: A more comprehensive project management or service desk solution that includes asset management.
signals.context: Small company with about 150 end users.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a simplistic trouble tracking system but is unsure if the product fits their needs.
signals.customer_ask: Clarification on whether the product can serve as a service desk.
signals.suggested_solution: A solution that combines ticket management with project management capabilities.
signals.context: Small company with about 150 end users.
